messages.title: The Tories Have Failed Working People
content: Working families are set to be an average of £1,400 a year worse off by 2020 due to tax and social security changes
Living standards have declined with real wages lower now than they were in 2010
5.7 million people are in jobs that pay less than the Living Wage, too many of the jobs that are being created are in low-paid, insecure work
They have failed to rule out raising Income Tax and National Insurance contributions for working people
Whilst working people are struggling those at the top have received tens of billions of pounds worth of tax breaks

messages.title: The Tory Economy Is Holding People Back
messages.content: Under the Tories working families will be on average over £1,400 a year worse off.
